Description:
Detects the image load of vss_ps.dll by uncommon executables

Author: Markus Neis, @markus_neis
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious Volume Shadow Copy VSS_PS.dll Load
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (image_loaded like '%\vss_ps.dll' and  not ((process_path like 'c:\program files\%' or process_path like 'c:\program files (x86)\%') or (command like 'c:\$winreagent\scratch\%' and command like '%\dismhost.exe {%') or process_path = 'null' or (process_path like 'c:\windows\%' and (process_path like '%\clussvc.exe' or process_path like '%\dismhost.exe' or process_path like '%\dllhost.exe' or process_path like '%\inetsrv\appcmd.exe' or process_path like '%\inetsrv\iissetup.exe' or process_path like '%\msiexec.exe' or process_path like '%\rundll32.exe' or process_path like '%\searchindexer.exe' or process_path like '%\srtasks.exe' or process_path like '%\svchost.exe' or process_path like '%\system32\systempropertiesadvanced.exe' or process_path like '%\taskhostw.exe' or process_path like '%\thor.exe' or process_path like '%\thor64.exe' or process_path like '%\tiworker.exe' or process_path like '%\vssvc.exe' or process_path like '%\wmiprvse.exe' or process_path like '%\wsmprovhost.exe'))))
